Shirtless man vanishes in Whanganui River: Emergency services respondinghttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/shirtless-man-vanishes-in-whanganui-river-emergency-services-responding/4MNGN6ZLKJDGHE6IZ6J4U2GXKI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/shirtless-man-vanishes-in-whanganui-river-emergency-services-responding/4MNGN6ZLKJDGHE6IZ6J4U2GXKI/ Mike TweedPolice, Coastguard and Wanganui Surf Lifeguard Service are responding. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 08:47:10 +0000 Emergency services were called about 8.20am on Friday. Photo / Bevan Conley
Tradie Jason Lambert loses bid to have fraud charges thrown out due to an “excessive” delay until trial https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tradie-jason-lambert-loses-bid-to-have-fraud-charges- thrown-out- due-to-an-excessive-delay-until-triing/ J57OCNTCYVGKFI4DU4F7LYO3OA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tradie-jason-lambert-loses-bid-to-have-fraud-charges- thrown-out- due-to-an-excessive-delay-until-triing/ J57OCNTCYVGKFI4DU4F7LYO3OA/ Belinda FeekJason Lambert's lawyer argued: “It’s his right to be tried without undue delay.” Fri, 14 Jun 2024 08:14:04 +0000 Judge Kim Saunders found the delay in getting Waikato tradie Jason Mark Lambert's fraud case to trial was not yet "plainly excessive" and declined his bid for a stay of proceedings. Photo / 123rf
Ukrainian New Zealanders call for Government to attend Global Peace Summit in Switzerland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ukrainian-new-zealanders-call-for-government-to-attend-global-peace-summit-in-switzerland/SLQEJMJ5PBD4BCFD7VNVXRIT5I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ukrainian-new-zealanders-call-for-government-to-attend-global-peace-summit-in-switzerland/SLQEJMJ5PBD4BCFD7VNVXRIT5I/ David WilliamsMore than 50 world leaders have confirmed they will attend the international event. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 08:10:23 +0000 New Zealand's Ukrainian community is encouraging Foreign Minister Winston Peters (inset) to attend the Global Peace Summit to show solidarity with Ukraine and its President, Volodymyr Zelenskyy. Photos / NZME / AP
Matariki Ki Te Manawa installation lights up Viaduct Harbour https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/matariki-ki-te-manawa-installation-lights-up-viaduct-harbour/5KXZNZZVVNBA5FQ5IPBFFPKGRQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/matariki-ki-te-manawa-installation-lights-up-viaduct-harbour/5KXZNZZVVNBA5FQ5IPBFFPKGRQ/ The installation is now in place in Market Square. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 08:03:02 +0000 The installation was unveiled and blessed this morning with Karakia Matariki, by Mana Whenua, Ngāti Whātua Ōrākei. Photo / James Rua
Person in critical condition after being hit by car in West Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-in-ritic-condition-after-being-hit-by-car-in-west-auckland/AC6GOYIUPFHODBL52SKK6HEUYQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-in-ritic-condition-after-being-hit-by-car-in-west-auckland/AC6GOYIUPFHODBL52SKK6HEUYQ/ Emergency services were called to the scene around 4pm. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 07:22:07 +0000 Emergency services were called to the scene on Westgate Drive near the intersections with Lazurite Drive and Fernhill Drive in West Auckland.
Michael Hill Jeweller to close Whakatāne store due to high retail crimehttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/michael-hill-jeweller-to-close-whakatane-store-due-to-high-retail-crime/GRO624RXVRBPTBTRDEQF6KOGME/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/michael-hill-jeweller-to-close-whakatane-store-due-to-high-retail-crime/GRO624RXVRBPTBTRDEQF6KOGME/ The store added extra security aids including fog cannons and additional security cameras. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 07:13:12 +0000 Michael Hill Jeweller in Whakatāne is closing at the end of the month due to being repeatedly targeted in retail crime. Photo / Google Maps
Watch: One Tree Hill and Otahuhu College rugby league players filmed in mass brawl after game https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watch-one-tree-hill-and-otahuhu-college-king-hit-triggers-mass-student-brawl-after-rugby-league-game/CIJCCQZOCRD3JF53P6O77LBGOI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watch-one-tree-hill-and-otahuhu-college-king-hit-triggers-mass-student-brawl-after-rugby-league-game/CIJCCQZOCRD3JF53P6O77LBGOI/ Ben LeahyPrincipal says students involved had 'brought embarrassment to our school'. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 07:00:00 +0000 A student believed to be from Otahuhu College king hits another student believed to be from One Tree Hill College, triggering a mass brawl between the two schools on Wednesday. Photo / Supplied
Mark Mitchell to attend Ukraine Global Peace Summit in Switzerland on behalf of New Zealand https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mark-mitchell-to-attend-ukraine-global-peace-summit-in-switzerland-on-behalf-of-new-zealand/6MSGBOSYRRBKZAA3CPGUNSOVRE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mark-mitchell-to-attend-ukraine-global-peace-summit-in-switzerland-on-behalf-of-new-zealand/6MSGBOSYRRBKZAA3CPGUNSOVRE/ David WilliamsMore than 50 countries have confirmed they are attending the conference in Lake Lucerne. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 06:47:57 +0000 Police Minister Mark Mitchell will represent New Zealand at the Global Peace Summit in Switzerland to reiterate the country's support for Ukraine its president, Volodymyr Zelenskyy.
Elder Abuse Awareness Day: Hawke’s Bay leaders call for law changes as cases increase https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/elder-abuse-awareness-day-hawkes-bay-leaders-call-for-law-changes-as-cases-increase/ELW7SEDL2FASZOPIDOKVY2YIMA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/elder-abuse-awareness-day-hawkes-bay-leaders-call-for-law-changes-as-cases-increase/ELW7SEDL2FASZOPIDOKVY2YIMA/ Mitchell HagemanThe number of incidents is on the rise and advocates want a law change. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 06:06:11 +0000 Hawke's Bay leaders are calling for change to laws relating to elder abuse. Photo / Getty Images
Pat Taka: Helicopter deployed in search for missing Hawke’s Bay grandfather https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/pat-taka-helicopter-deployed-in-search-for-missing-hawkes-bay-grandfather/KX4BGB2RENHSTKG74JV3TPKIZI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/pat-taka-helicopter-deployed-in-search-for-missing-hawkes-bay-grandfather/KX4BGB2RENHSTKG74JV3TPKIZI/ Gary Hamilton-Irvine'For him to be gone this long without accessing any money is very worrying for us.' Fri, 14 Jun 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Pat Taka at a family wedding last year. He has been missing for almost three months. Photo / Taka Family
